name: The Decorated Box
description:
Maybe it's not so hard to leave after all.

The Decorated Box is a work in Unity3D WebGL. It is free to experience, and can be played in your browser immediately here: https://ocias.com/games/the-decorated-box/

Estimated play time: 1 minute.

A game by Alex Ocias with audio by Stefano Guzzetti. Built in Unity3D for WebGL.
